sentences.english: Ron's car only had a limited warranty and he had to pay for new tires himself.
sentences.chinese: 隆恩的车子只有限额保险，所以换胎要自费。

sentences.english: In many ways we are trying to help these self--financed students to make good choice.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量以多种方式帮助这些自费学生做出好的选择。

sentences.english: Law Master also has at public expense at one's own expenses.
sentences.chinese: 法学硕士有公费也有自费。

sentences.english: Guests can also ride camel, appreciate at the vast desert landscape.
sentences.chinese: 客人也可自费骑驼，欣赏浩瀚无垠的大漠风光。

sentences.english: In 1993, we started to train self-paying students for international business.
sentences.chinese: 1993年，咱们开始培训国际商务自费生。

sentences.english: I took them all down to the disney world for a week on my nickle .
sentences.chinese: 我自费带他们全体到迪斯尼乐园去玩了一个星期。

sentences.english: The seller shall procure, at his own cost and in a transferable form, a policy of marine insurance.
sentences.chinese: 卖方应自费购买可转让的海运保险单。

sentences.english: Today, the majority of Chinese students studying overseas are doing so at their own expense.
sentences.chinese: 目前，绝大多数中国留学生都是自费生。

sentences.english: In the evening you may pay own expenses to go to visit Crazy house Monafuze night club for show.
sentences.chinese: 晚间您可自费前往参观疯马或红磨坊歌舞秀。

sentences.english: Buyer may, at Buyer's expenses, have its representative be present during the draft survey at the loading port.
sentences.chinese: 做装港水尺期间，买方可自费派代表全程监督。

sentences.english: Were you sponsored by the government or self-supported?
sentences.chinese: 你是由国家公派的还是自费留学？

sentences.english: Australia has since proved to be one of the very destinations for self-funded Chinese travelers.
sentences.chinese: 自从澳大利亚成为中国公民自费旅游目的国。

sentences.english: It was paid for by the Discovery Channel for their show on geoengineering.
sentences.chinese: 探索频道关于地球工程学的节目是自费制作的。

sentences.english: Academic works at their own expense, often to the press, academic research into the voluntary labor.
sentences.chinese: 学术著作常常要自费出版，学术研究变成了义务劳动。

sentences.english: Students resuming study should apply for X visa to come to China.
sentences.chinese: 来华自费留学生完成学业后由外事处颁发在学证明。

sentences.english: In 1993, we started to train self -paying students for international business.
sentences.chinese: 1993年，我们开始培训国际商务自费生。

definition: to submit an expense account/to apply for reimbursement/to write off/to wipe out
to dip into one's pocket/to pay out of pocket/to foot the bill
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
